abstracts.cdata!:
This is a statement by Valeriano F.
            Garcia at the Board meeting of November 10, 1998 concerning
            the Country Assistance Strategy, the Special Structural
            Adjustment Loan, and the Repurchase Facility Support Loan
            for Argentina.
